sentences.en: " To see every bush and tree on Mount Bagong as an enemy soldier " is an example of misconception.
sentences.cn: “ 八公山上,草木皆兵 ”,是错觉之一例.

sentences.en: It is a misconception that Peggy was fabulously wealthy.
sentences.cn: 人们误以为佩吉相当有钱。

sentences.en: It is a misconception to assume that the two continents are similar.
sentences.cn: 关于这两块大陆相似的假设是一种误解。

sentences.en: It is a popular misconception that all Scotsmen are mean.
sentences.cn: 很多人误以为苏格兰人都很小气.

sentences.en: Julie Gardner on the misconception about the amount of sex in Torchwood.
sentences.cn: 火炬木中大量对于性的误解.

sentences.en: Let me know . everything is because of my misconception. OK?
sentences.cn: 9月3日9:07告诉我. 这一切都是我的误解, 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Many tennis players have a misconception of achieving topspin on groundstrokes.
sentences.cn: 许多网球选手对于落地回击上旋球有误解.

sentences.en: My misconception of her purpose cast a damp over her spirits.
sentences.cn: 我误解她的意图,使她大为扫兴.

sentences.en: Remarkably , however, high humidity's most noticeable side effect might be a misconception.
sentences.cn: 不过, 高温最值得人注意的副作用可能是它给人带来的误解.

sentences.en: The misconception are superior to women is still dominating many people's minds.
sentences.cn: 重男轻女的偏见仍然主导着许多人的思想.

sentences.en: There is a big misconception with the way stuns work now.
sentences.cn: 由于现在击晕效果的作用方式(15秒内的惩罚),它的效果受到了严重影响.

sentences.en: There is a common misconception that war has obsoleted the peace progress.
sentences.cn: 人们普遍错误地认为战争已经破坏了和平进程.

sentences.en: There is a misconception that a blind person cannot draw.
sentences.cn: 有一种错误的观念,认为盲人不能作画.

sentences.en: They gave rise to all sorts of misconception and superstitions.
sentences.cn: 这会引起他们的错误观念和迷信.

sentences.en: This misconception and his gallantry seemed in some way to bring her and me closer together.
sentences.cn: 这种误解和他的殷勤反倒使我和她更亲密了.

trans.tran_en: an idea which is wrong or untrue, but which people believe because they do not understand the subject properly
